reference:
This data set is used to illustrate multi-state survival curves.
It is based on the actual study in the reference below.
A subset of subjects was de-identifed, reordered, and then all of the
time values randomly perturbed.
description:
Description
This simulated data set is based on a trial in acute myeloid
leukemia.
title: Acute myeloid leukemia

parameters.death: 1 if futime is a death, 0 for censoring
parameters.futime: time to death or last follow-up
parameters.txtime: time to hematropetic stem cell transplant
parameters.flt3:
mutations of the FLT3 gene, a factor with levels
of A, B, C

format: A data frame with 646 observations on the following 9 variables.
